data.text: @LCWF_TBK JH clearly comes from a place where every vehicle is a bus and every pedestrian is blind, poor love.

@LCWF_TBK Three children, all 'hit by buses' at different times in the space of a year, one of them twice. Is it possible that this woman is a useless cretin and no-one should ever listen to a word she says again?
@sheeza_blade @LCWF_TBK @cocobelladoodle Yes, quite incredible these statements have never been challenged properly. No doubt the inquiry will be brushed under the carpet.
@SunderlandLolly @LCWF_TBK @cocobelladoodle #Harries should face trial at #TheHague I wonder how many people her "schools are safe" mantra has killed?
@LCWF_TBK She even looks like a wrongun before she opens her nonsense mouth

@LCWF_TBK I have 3.5yr and 2yr grandsons. Older one caught C19 in nursery last week. At A&E Saturday. His little brother is on his way there tonight. This is not mild in kids, this is brutal. Both parents very sick too. Parents fully faxed but kids bearing the brunt of this so called flu
